tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had been there for general health check up. The staff was really good and fast at everything. They sugggested me the best package they had, which covered most of the checks at a very reasonable price.I did not literally have to wait a extra minute to consult the doctor.The Doctor was very patient enough to expalin things clearly and also that the suggestions that were given was something simple that i could follow easily. The best part was that I was not directly given list of medications at a go, but instaed the doctor has given me sometime where i can get few things into control naturally, only if i fail to do so, i will be prescribed for medcations from the next visit. I am truly satisfied!Good Hospital, Good and friendly Staff with Great Doctors.

tags: None
review:
Hadn't heard of this clinic before despite staying in the area. But was pleasantly surprised. The clinic is well maintained.
Friendly and professional staff.
Doctor was helpful and listened to the problem and tests were done at a nominal rate and you get 30% off on all treatments. 
Good experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Stomach pain and stomach upset,Low Blood Pressure,
review: *** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** *** She is friendly and spent a lot of time probing to make sure that the issue is diagnosed properly. Her explanation and treatment are really good and it's worth it l. Moreover Humian Health is a wonderful clinic. So neat and clean and the best part is that it's not expensive at all. It looks expensive but is not.... Top notch care.

tags: None
review:
Didn't think the staff was experienced enough, I had to visit another hospital the same day as there was no relief.

So on Practo the consultation Fee was mentioned Rs.400 but they charged me Rs.650 saying the fee is Rs.500 and Rs.150 bcoz you are a first time visitor.

Also it was mentioned on the slip that next 2 visits will be free of cost. I visited thrice but no staff available over the weekend and on Monday.

The next day when the staff was available, they charged me another Rs.100 just for monitoring the BP. (no doctor available.)

Overall it was horrible experience paying Rs.750, visited 5 times and no relief.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: she is so good. patiently listened to my symptoms. gave feedback on my symptoms. prescribed medicines and explain what each medicine is for and how they work. she is so calm and good. a big YES if you plan to visit her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor was very friendly, took all my medical history into account, and took care of me very well. One of my best experiences.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Clean Clinic and friendly staff Doctor explained the issue clearly n suggested for lifestyle modification which sounded practical and can actually be inculcated. Happy with the suggestions given.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was very satisfied  with the treatment received. Dr. Thara  was very patient, listened to my issues and suggested a course of treatment  that was very effective. I started feeling better the very next day. She also took time to take my family history and suggested  additional measures to maintain good health.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Very good dealings & friendly behaviour, explanation, ambiance,wait time,also service in the clinic,

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very bad experience. ** ****** * **** ** *** ** *** *********** *** *** ******* **** *** ******** ** ********* ** *** *** **** ****** ** ***** ******** * ****** **** ***** ** ********** *** ***** **** ** *** **********. she prescribed the medicine which I'm already taking of different company. Doctor says im not having nonveg and eggs so im getting giddiness and i have vitamin deficiency bcz of that.
